Intelligent, articulate and dedicated, Chad is a guaranteed prize player. I couldn't have wished for a more calm, friendly and engaging person to join my team. In the dev world it can sometimes be difficult to find someone that's hard working and super-smart without being stubborn and difficult to work with, but Chad really is that person. Whether he's working alone on a task or pairing up to solve something, whether it's heavy coding, working on ideas or preparing documentation, you can be sure it'll be nothing less than 100%.

February 7, 2016, Erica was senior to Chad but didn’t manage directly

As HR manager at Clevertech, I was the first person on our team that Chad had a chance to wow— but I wasn’t the last. Chad delights clients, project managers, and the developers he codes alongside for a number of reasons. He’s a great listener that loves exploring new ideas. He understands how to share a vision. He’s always growing his talents and ready to use them to support others through tough challenges. The result? Chad is a knockout developer. If you’re reading this, connect with him and set a time to grab coffee with him. You’ll be glad you did!
